title: オークスの後に・冠はなくとも

text.jpText:
惜しくも1着を逃して悔しさを滲ませる
エアグルーヴは、それでもファンたちが
満足する走りを見せることができた。
text.enText:
Airgroove, who was disappointed to 
miss out on a first-place finish, still 
managed to run a race that fans satisfied 
with her performance.

text.jpText:
自分に自信が持てなかったメジロドーベルも、
堂々たるエアグルーヴの姿を目の当たりに
して、彼女に強い“憧れ”を抱く。
text.enText:
Mejiro Dobel, who had never had confidence 
in herself, was impressed by the majestic 
Airgroove and developed a strong "admiration" 
for her. She was a strong admirer of 
Airgroove's.

text.jpText:
エアグルーヴはその視線を感じつつ、
『秋華賞』では今日以上の走りを
見せるのだと、気合いを入れ直すのだった。
text.enText:
Airgroove could feel the stares from the 
other runners, and she was determined to show 
even better performance than today in the 
"Shuka-sho". Airgroove felt their eyes on 
her, and she was determined to show them that 
she could do even better than she did today.
